1.comment: Brodie Croyle wasn't hurt, the Chiefs would have won this game. - Puppy Puncher, WF.com Forum Member. I never would have thought anyone would say the Chiefs winning was dependent on Croyle being in the game, but I guess that happens when Croyle wasn't hurt, the Chiefs would have won this game. - Puppy Puncher, WF.com Forum Member. I never would have thought anyone would say the Chiefs winning was dependent on Croyle being in the game, but I guess that happens when Damon Huard is your backup.

2.comment: Brodie Croyle and Damon Huard, leave the game with injuries.Croyle and Damon Huard, leave the game with injuries. Croyle was 9-of-10 for 63 yards before suffering a sprained knee. He's out for the year. Huard was 9-of-16 for 96 yards, but hurt his harm.

player_team_score.sentence: Croyle was 16-of-24 for 177 yards and 2 touchdowns.

3.comment: Brodie Croyle was very impressive in this contest, considering the defense he was going up against. Croyle was 16-of-24 for 177 yards and 2 touchdowns. On a game-tying drive late in the 4.h quarter, Croyle was 4-of-5 for 55 yards. There's little doubt that Croyle is the best quarterback on the Chiefs, but he can't stay healthy. Ironically, Matt Cassel should be back to ruin things next week.    Croyle was very impressive in this contest, considering the defense he was going up against. Croyle was 16-of-24 for 177 yards and 2 touchdowns. On a game-tying drive late in the 4.h quarter, Croyle was 4-of-5 for 55 yards. There's little doubt that Croyle is the best quarterback on the Chiefs, but he can't stay healthy. Ironically, Matt Cassel should be back to ruin things next week.

passing_attempts.sentence: Brodie Croyle was awful (7-of-17, 40 yards), but Cassel isn't very talented either.

4.comment: Brodie Croyle was awful (7-of-17, 40 yards), but Cassel isn't very talented either. He wouldn't have made the difference. Second, good teams can win without their starting quarterback during a short period of time. Just look at the Steelers, who upset the Falcons with Dennis Dixon. The Chiefs just aren't a good team.    Besides, Cassel needs a running game to be effective, which is something Kansas City could not establish Sunday. Croyle was awful (7-of-17, 40 yards), but Cassel isn't very talented either. The Chiefs just aren't a good team.    Besides, Cassel needs a running game to be effective, which is something Kansas City could not establish Sunday.
